title: Daily Life of a Wealthy Woof - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Acting   Animal Characteristics   Celebrities   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Doting Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Pets   Proactive Protagonist   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Reincarnation   Showbiz   Transformation Ability   Wealthy Characters
author: 婻书
description:
High society CEO Big BOSS Lu expresses that he’s felt stifled recently. Ever since a woof style creature intruded upon his home, his life has become a complete mess. A slight conflict in opinion and his couch is hijacked, his desk seized, his lap forcefully occupied, even his bed was forcefully dominated!

The small Samoyed, with his head resting upon his waste removal official’s thigh and four paws facing the sky exposing a soft little belly, with a face full of untainted purity and a pair of innocent eyes: “Woof~”

Big BOSS Lu lowers his head and makes eye contact for three seconds : “…. Give give give! Whatever you want, I will give it to you!”>
